io.janusproject.services.distributeddata

Interface DMapListener<K,V>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - - type of the keys.
    V - - type of the values.
    All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener

    public interface DMapListener<K,V>
extends EventListener
    Listener on changes in a DMap.
    Version:
    2.0.3.0 2015-11-30 17:37:13
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.kernel

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void entryAdded(K key, V value)
      Invoked when an entry is added in the map.
      void entryRemoved(K key, V value)
      Invoked when an entry was removed the map.
      void entryUpdated(K key, V value)
      Invoked when the value of an entry has changed.
      void mapCleared(boolean localClearing)
      Invoked when the map was cleared.

    • Method Detail

      • entryAdded

        void entryAdded(K key,
                V value)
        Invoked when an entry is added in the map.
        Parameters:
        key - - the added key.
        value - - the added value.

      • entryUpdated

        void entryUpdated(K key,
                  V value)
        Invoked when the value of an entry has changed.
        Parameters:
        key - - the removed key.
        value - - the removed value.

      • entryRemoved

        void entryRemoved(K key,
                  V value)
        Invoked when an entry was removed the map.
        Parameters:
        key - - the removed key.
        value - - the removed value.

      • mapCleared

        void mapCleared(boolean localClearing)
        Invoked when the map was cleared.
        Parameters:
        localClearing - - indicates if the clear in local (true) or for all the nodes on the network (false).
